website_summaries.verdict: This is a heavy-duty steel safe to protect valuables from theft or fire. Store medications, papers, jewelry, weapons, media of all types.
pros: Steel frame for extra durability, emergency key in case you forget keypad code
Tested to UL standards (UL 72), adjustable internal shelf, padded/soft door/interior
Comes with bolting kit to secure to floor
cons: Door doesn’t shut super tight on some safes
Plastic keypad might not be durable over time

customer_reviews.title: Not secure
customer_reviews.text: Returning this safe because my coworker was able to open the safe by using a BIC pen instead of the key it comes with. He was able to do it 3 times and the video is of the 3rd time, the first time took about 30 seconds to get into. Definitely not secure and don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: This Thing is a Tank!
customer_reviews.text: This safe came yesterday and it is just as great as Advertised. It’s 102.6 pounds (took 2 to get it to the second story, 2 inch thick door, adjustable shelving, and super easy to program. Comes with two backup keys in case you forget your password. Safe locks automatically after 5 seconds of inputting the code. It also has a hole with a 1/2 inch bolt to secure it to the ground. Don’t let the brand name worry you...this thing is legit and a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: ccon0509

customer_reviews.title: Great Safe For This Class
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a bargain for this safe. It seems well built but would like the door to seal tighter (slight movement when locked). The steps to reset the code are very simple. I read the directions and made sure I fully understood them and 1 minute later my new code was set and worked every time. Those stating that it is difficult to enter their own custom code either have a defective safe (which I doubt) or they're not reading and following the directions.
customer_reviews.author: JimFromPA

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money Cons
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1. Good-size "safe". 2. Good value for the money Cons: 1. The electronic keypad is flimsy plastic. Once you unscrew it from the safe, its held only by the electronics cable dangling from the control board. All electronics and wiring are exposed and ready for tampering or possible hacking. 2. Battery is on the outside, should be on the inside with redundancy for failure. 3. The door doesn't shut tightly with about 2-3mm wiggle space. Not sure how it can be fire resistant! 4. The reset button is located in an unsafe location on the inside. Can be accessed while locked. 4. Like all safes in its class, it will not deter a determined thief.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: SO SORRY AMAZON
customer_reviews.text: I have to amend my original review of this product. Simple very basic amateur troubleshooting. Replaced my "new 9 volt" battery with a newer new 9 volt and my disappointment is no more. My fault, my bad, my error. Sorry again Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: it should be of slightly better quality.
customer_reviews.text: The safe feels cheap especially the key pad and handle... door looks thick but is very light. The door doesn’t seal very tight and is loose when closed... All in all its cheaply made and I would expect if amazon is selling this with their name on it, it should be of slightly better quality..
customer_reviews.author: christopher salih

customer_reviews.title: A solid safe
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a specialized purpose, to be opened only in the case of an absolute emergency. There are a couple important features of this safe that make me happy I purchased it. First, the battery can be changed without opening the safe. For storing things long term, without wanting to risk exposure of the contents of the safe, this was a must for me. Secondly, removal of the battery does not reset the combination. Finally, combinations can be up to eight digits long, as opposed to some (more expensive) safes that only have four or five digit maximums. Build quality seems fine enough that I'm confident it will serve my needs for many years to come
customer_reviews.author: A.J.

customer_reviews.title: Structurally great but cheap keypad that doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Safe is structurally sound, medium sized, spacious enough for personal items, secure and not extremely heavy. However, 2 stars because the electronic panel is cheaply made with poor programming. Others have had the same issue with the panel showing all 3 lights and not opening despite placing in the correct code or even trying to reset it with factory code. It's come to a point that I have to open it with a key every time which then brings me to two stars - what's the point in purchasing a keypad entry safe when it doesn't even work? We've only had the safe for about a month or two now and already want to issue a return and replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.BSy

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: The shelves fall down inside if you move it after you've set it up, and the front electronic lock is apt to fall off the panel. However. If once you've got it where you want it, and want a safe, it's pretty good at it's job. Be dextrous with the keypad and there's no problems. FYI - it's fire resistant, so it you position it against an outside wall you can tell the fire service where it is and they might cut a hole and pull it out through the hole for you in the event of a fire. Or maybe not.
customer_reviews.author: Borg King

customer_reviews.title: Great box; cheap lock; questionable mechanism.
customer_reviews.text: This is the third safe I bought, and it is for a temporary accommodation. The box and door feel very sturdy and I am sure it would take someone a lot of blood, sweat, and tears to get through the box by brute force. But the locking mechanism just doesn't feel very sturdy, and the electronic lock feels super cheap compared to my other two. The keypad has an unusual arrangement (i.e. not telephone-keypad arrangement). Easy to set your own combination. The lock takes a 9V battery which I found annoying since I didn't have one of those as handy as I do have AAs and AAAs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but very disappointed that the electronic keypad function is useless
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two. Both now experience the problem with the electronic keypad described in many other reviews: When the correct code is entered all three lights come on and the safe cannot be opened. I've changed out the batteries and still the same. It seems you can consider this a keyed safe only. The safe comes with 2 keys, and to answer someone's question I saw on here, the locks are different so keys from another safe of the same model will not unlock every safe. Decent safe otherwise, but very disappointed that the electronic keypad function is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Brandau

customer_reviews.title: excellent functionality; however one of the emergency keys is ...
customer_reviews.text: The safe box is as described, excellent functionality; however one of the emergency keys is mot good as you can see, see pictures attached.
customer_reviews.author: CARLOS RIPOLL

customer_reviews.title: Right out of the box it doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: Key pad doesn't work on brand new safe. Now I have to have the whole thing replaced. I have the same exact problem as several other customers. Keys work, codes don't. Tried multiple batteries. I can even charge the code using the red button but can't unlock using the code. Amazon is sending me a replacement. Not a great experience so far. They didn't even try resolving the problem despite the person on the phone trying to contact tech experts. Now I have to lug 70lbs back down a flight of stairs and wait several days for the replacement. I hope the replacement safe will work.
customer_reviews.author: The Edge

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality product
customer_reviews.text: It's a pity that this is such a poor quality product. The problem is that the keypad basically does not work. If you are ok only using the key, this is fine. But then, is it worth the price? Returning is just not a viable option for some people. The 2 cu ft version is around 100 lbs. Amazon tried to make things right and I appreciate that, but now I am stuck with a mediocre product. I can only hope that this thing opens when I need it too.
customer_reviews.author: CT_TX

customer_reviews.title: Great safe, well made
customer_reviews.text: Was pleasantly surprised with this safe. Many of the other safes we checked out had plastic handles, this one is metal. It's heavy duty, very roomy and has adjustable shelves. Also a great price compared to other safe manufacturer's. Also comes with one large bolt on bottom to secure to floor. Arrived with no dings or dents even though the box arrived pretty thrashed. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jandor

customer_reviews.title: Short battery life
customer_reviews.text: The digital pad that opens the safe needs a battery and it only lasts six months. So instead of a combination, there's a key and luckily that works every time. Don't know why they bother with the digital pad. Otherwise the safe seems solid and strong but as yet no-one's tried to break into it and we haven't had a fire so I don't know how secure it really is. But it's certainly better than the cardboard box where we used to keep important papers.
customer_reviews.author: Avedon if only

customer_reviews.title: Keypad failed before two years
customer_reviews.text: Purchased July 2018, Liked how sturdy this safe is and how easy the keypad was to use. Unfortunately the keypad stopped working today not two years after purchase. Installed a few new batteries to test and still won't turn on, instructions say a "red light" should come on when a new battery is needed but no lights are on and it is unresponsive. Saw a few other reviews about keypad failure and should have listened. Will work for a while, but unfortunately only a key works now.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle P

customer_reviews.title: Great safe especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great safe especially for the price. Those of you that are having problems with the keypad system I believe are misreading the directions. I did at first as well. You don’t hit the #when you put your own code in. only when you put in the original code
customer_reviews.author: Florida lady

customer_reviews.title: The initial combination does not work. The only way ...
customer_reviews.text: The initial combination does not work. The only way it can be used is with the key. Do not buy tis safe, it will not work.
customer_reviews.author: Fred D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I am not a safe conasuer by any means. I have never needed to drop my safe from 200 feet onto a competitors safe, or drag it behind a truck I just want some place to stick SS cards and tax info. Perfect for that!!
customer_reviews.author: Thearon W.

customer_reviews.title: You can make the buttons silent so it’s not super noisy to open
customer_reviews.text: You can make the buttons silent so it’s not super noisy to open, the door and safe as a whole is very sturdy and secure, the locking mechanism are 3 large pieces of steel. All in all very pleased with this purchase and doesn’t break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No good!
customer_reviews.text: I had the safe for about 1 month. The keypad stopped working and the lock wouldn't work either. Very frustrating. Big problem. I got it open and tried to reset and it wouldn't unlock. I tried so many times and it wouldn't open. I had to return. Better to buy something heavy like this local, which is what I did. I never knew how easy to return though with Amazon. They took it back very easily and I shipped it out.
customer_reviews.author: detoxifeyed

customer_reviews.title: Safe the combination lock falls off. Takes several times to unlock. Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: The battery operated plastic lock falls off. Wiring is cheaply made. All of our contents are locked inside. Cheap safe key is already stripped and the lock will not open. Item is not very good at all. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Home Safe
customer_reviews.text: Seems very well made. Yes, the keypad could be more robust but overall quality is very good. I replaced the anchor bolt with a 1/2" x 4" long bolt for added security. Added battery operated motion sencing interior lights and am very pleased with the safe. It's a good choice for any home and big enough to hold a good deal. It's a lot of safe for the money spent and since I installed a 4 camera YI security system for $119. I feel totally secure since one of the cameras is used to monitor the safe area 24/7. I am so pleased with this safe that I plan to order a 2nd one for my office .
customer_reviews.author: Alan D

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I guess when it is easy to use, you don't get Fort Knox security. Which is fine. It does not contain anything of great value. The key pad is easy to operate, and when the battery dies, if you follow the instructions you can gain access without a blow torch. It is just one more level of obvious security to help with that feeling we all get when we leave home for any extended period of time. Keeps honest people honest, and the dishonest? Well they get what they deserve.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Tough, heavy, strong safe. I've only used it for a week or two but have no complaints. The moveable shelves makes it perfect for any size goods you need to lock up and the carpet makes for a good base to store sensitive items. I like I can turn the sounds of the key pad, nothing like someone breaking into your house and they hear your BEEP BEEP BEEP into a safe and find where you are.
customer_reviews.author: Mish

customer_reviews.title: Works only with a physical key
customer_reviews.text: A safe is supposed to do two basic things. Lock and unlock. Hard to believe that they dont test for this before shipping it. I ordered one of these, and found that the digital keypad does not unlock. Called up customer service, and they sent me a new one. I had the pleasure of packing and hauling the 80 lb safe back to the UPS store. The second unit that I received suffers from the same issue. I have decided to use it with the physical key and spare myself the pain of taking it back to the UPS store. Spare yourself the pain and please do not order this safe.
customer_reviews.author: Praveen Herur

customer_reviews.title: Its ok....Just needs work on shipping on Pin Pad Element
customer_reviews.text: Good item. I would have thought for the price the front combination element would have been metal. It is like a cheaper plastic which i am not the hugest fan about as i see it breaking if not careful, Shipping of the box was a nightmare as it was no good and torn apart. There are scratches on the side of the safe but overall too heavy to return. It will do the job but just disappointed on some of the elements and shipping of the item for the amount of money it cost,
customer_reviews.author: Buddy

customer_reviews.title: Bolt to floor hardware.
customer_reviews.text: This is a STACK-ON Safe. I know because I recently bought one for my guns. The digital lock code was the same as the gun safe. I like the safe but the directions call for a 12mm hole to be drilled for the attach to floor hardware. The largest metric drill bit I found locally was 10mm and Amazon wasn't much better. My recommendation would be to the manufacturer. If you can't use US size bolts then send the size metric drill bit required with the safe! I ended up drilling two holes at the back safe bottom and using lag screws to secure it to the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Dave H

customer_reviews.title: Defective electronic lock does not work. Will use supplied ...
customer_reviews.text: Defective electronic lock does not work. Will use supplied keys. It's a shame that AMAZON allowed the use of sub par materials, workmanship and quality control in a critical area as the electronics.
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Safe
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised when I discovered Amazon could ship safes. This is the perfect size for keeping documents, valuables and even full sized hand guns secured. The metal feels very solid, and there is a hole in the base for a bolt to secure to the floor. Each safe comes with two back up keys in case the battery of the electronic lock dies. Overall a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Antithesis

customer_reviews.title: LASTED 8 MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: The safe lasted 8 months until the lock died. The key backup was sticky at best, thank god I could get my items out of the safe. I called Amazon and spoke to a nice person who repeated every word at least three times before shipping me a replacement. I received the replacement today and it doesn't work out of the box. I tried calling Amazon and they are too busy because of the virus... this is going to be a long journey, I think if you are looking for a safe, spend the extra and get a Sentry
customer_reviews.author: Clarence Barnes

customer_reviews.title: So - So
customer_reviews.text: Not great, but did not expect much for the price. Handle is kinda flimsy and door doesn't shut tight/tight. Concerned whether contents would truly survive a fire. Security Bolts would work on concrete floor, but not on a wood floor. Anchor screw for wood floor is not provided. Concrete bolt and expansion nut were included, but probably not practical if you don't have a concrete floor to attach to. Electronic key pad is a bit cheesy, but having a key back-up give me peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: J Gray

customer_reviews.title: Nothing wrong with safe, just bad customer service
customer_reviews.text: Had difficulty with trying to get customer service to help with troubleshooting, so ended up returning it. It was sturdy and heavy, so it would have been great to keep if Amazon was helpful.
customer_reviews.author: CJF

customer_reviews.title: common problem, may have fix
customer_reviews.text: Ok. Got this product very well boxed up. Great quality as a safe. Key pad could be better quality. Had an issue and Amazon offered to replace it no questions. Issue was Key pad did not work correctly with new 9 volt tested battery. Mad a call and found out it only works with Duracell or Energizer battery. Not sure why so I tested it. And yes it now works great. So if key pad does not work buy name brand battery.
customer_reviews.author: Gus Bauder

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as fire resistant as others I have. Has isulation screwed on but not continuous coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Geebe

customer_reviews.title: This Safe has Issues
customer_reviews.text: Storage capacity is satisfactory. There are two problems that concern me. 1. I was not able to change the password. I followed the instructions provided and attempted to change it numerous times without success. 2. The keypad is very flimsy. Overall, not worth the money that I'm paying for it.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Fireproof?  I hope I don't find out
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, enough room for crucial papers and my 6 handguns (I bought pistol hangers that slide onto the shelf and into the barrels). Easy to program code, so 1-2-3-4 is now my combo. (NOT) There is a little play to the door when closed. I glued a line of the felt packing material along an edge and that's no longer present. In case of fire, I think the contents may get smokey, though.
customer_reviews.author: tch

customer_reviews.title: Better the other suggested
customer_reviews.text: I think this safe is a lot better then other reviewers are giving it credit for. Especially for the low price. It’s a good safe not great. Yes, the battery being on the outside of the safe somewhat concerning..but I mostly purchased this for the storage capacity, fire resistance and to make it a little more difficult for potential thieves to get into or get it out of my home before I can act and alert authorities.. As long as you understand what your getting into and it’s not just sitting in plain sight, bolted into the floor. it’s a good safe with a lot of space and a good value for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Desmond Deverux

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Safe with Space
customer_reviews.text: Safe is sturdy for price and need. This will not stop any serious thief but its a way to slow them. A 100lbs not easy to lug around for a crackhead, good deterrent. Safety wise allows me to keep things out of the kid's hands while having easy access to protection. The one knock the key pad does feel chinsey but works fine so far.
customer_reviews.author: DZM

customer_reviews.title: Defective keypad
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this safe except for the fact that the keypad is defective. It would not accept the default factory code, and then when I reset the code and made a new one, it won't accept it. I followed the instructions that were provided with the safe exactly how they are printed and nothing will work, and Amazon will not allow me to return it. UPDATE: Amazon issued me a replacement order and that replacement is still defective. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: iamjeffsmith

customer_reviews.title: Arrived dented and defective
customer_reviews.text: There was a small ding in the top of the safe. Not something I expect in a new item. When I tried to reprogram the passcode # for the safe, it acted like it was taking it, but then wouldn't open. I'd have to open it with the backup key. That defeats the purpose of having a safe with a digital keypad. Had to return because Amazon insisted on trying to deliver a replacement on a day I wouldn't be home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Is it worth it?
customer_reviews.text: The storage capacity is great! I’m 5’ 3” and it goes up to my thighs, but it does take up a lot of space, so do choose where you want to place it. The safe is a bit nosy, I yank on the handle and it shakes like crazy, like if the bolts aren’t stable...The code pad is this cheap plastic with wires inside...If you want a big safe then this is your choice, but I would recommend something much cheaper and better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Kim Huynh

customer_reviews.title: Fit my space
customer_reviews.text: I had the opportunity to install a safe in a wide wall. This was the perfect size to fit between the studs. I like having a metal handle to turn - it seems study. The combination lock works fine, but I have no idea how secure it would be against a knowledgable trying to break in.
customer_reviews.author: NewEnglander

customer_reviews.title: Great safe.
customer_reviews.text: Great safe. Hopefully its for Fire protection. Its heavy but can be lifted by a person. Not for theft proof but will be locked. Just got it to keep a gun out of kids hands and some harddrives and documents.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality safe that is exactly as advertised. Durable, solid and apparently well manufactured. My only criticism is there is a 4 digit emergency backup code that seems like a security risk since it can't be removed and it is printed in the manual (I'm sure it is different for every safe). I'd like to use the key to open it the first time rather than have an emergency code available.
customer_reviews.author: RMK

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: We've only had it for a week or so, and so far so good. We bought it to house a change bank, and I must admit it's a bit small ( it looks bigger in the picture). As far as functionality, it works well (one week old). It came with detailed instructions for use. As our business grows, I hope we'll need a bigger one. It's good for the money.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Good size and functionality. Bad method for attaching to the floor
customer_reviews.text: Overall good, but the bottom panel that is used to secure it to the floor is too flimsy. It's also super inconvenient to attach it to the floor instead of the wall. Also the keypad is a cheap feeling plastic. Good price for the size though.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Works well,
customer_reviews.text: Works well, won't keep out a determined thief but for keeping my ammo locked up it's exactly what I need
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Feels great to know if anything happens I'm protected
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and design. Feels good to have my valuables protected incase of fire or thief. Good amount of space inside, and easy to use, and understand instructions for set up. Also able to be bolted to the ground so that's a plus. I would recommend to anyone looking to protect their things.
customer_reviews.author: brownUPStruck

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: This thing is junk. Does not lock back up. I've gone through all the troubleshooting and I have followed the instructions meticulously and honestly its just a pile of worthlessness. I haven't yet been able to even use it. Pay up for a better product. Serves me right for being cheap, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Cara King

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size. Heavy. Can bolt to floor
customer_reviews.text: Heavy and exactly what I needed to store valuables and important paperwork. The price for the quality was excellent. It is a good size and will fit easily in a closet or office. I am thrilled that I found this before purchasing the 400.00 one from a store close to home.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Keypads doesn't work twice
customer_reviews.text: I got the first safe multiple days late, and the factory code they gave me would not open the safe. I used the keys to open it and changed the code, still would not work. Then it just started beeping rapidly and none of the buttons would work anymore. Got it replaced and the second one had the exact same problem. This product does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Stettler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Amazon Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The product is as described. The factory preset code failed to open the safe using the keypad. I followed the instructions faithfully to reprogram a new code but failed in my multiple attempts. I called Amazon. They wanted to replace the entire heavy unit. I stated that I could still open and close the safe using the key. Not believing in waste, I offered to keep the safe and Amazon on their end offered a financial credit to offset the product flaw. A win-win situation.
customer_reviews.author: Manoj R. Vora M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Only one hole to secure it to the floor.
customer_reviews.text: Drill sizes are metric and mounting instructions are poor. 4 bottom holes when be much more secure than one. Other than that, it's an ok safe.
customer_reviews.author: Ed E

customer_reviews.title: Seldom have I got a non working amazon prime product
customer_reviews.text: After 2 hours of call with amazon I was finally able to return this heavy useless junk. The key pad doesn't work. Amazon was kind enough to refund me as transportation of a 90+ lbs item is an ordeal. $8 spent on batteries spent for no use. But this is useless - only opens with the key - keypad doesn't work. Go for anything different - I will most likely go to Walmart or target to get something that really works.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Omaha

customer_reviews.title: Simple, solid, effective
customer_reviews.text: Its heavier than I expected, I suppose that is necessary for the fire resistance. It looks good, feels secure, and only took a few minutes to set up. Has more room inside than I expected. I feel confident with storing essentials in this and nobody being able to tell whats in it, much less open it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hanson

customer_reviews.title: i can not get any one to help me with a problem!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping to enjoy the safe. Little did I know I would have so many problems and I can not get anyone to help and I am sure they will wait until my warranty runs out and then reach back out. Do your self a favor and go buy somewhere else!!
customer_reviews.author: THE EAGLE

customer_reviews.title: Built like its pricey bigger brothers.
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing not to like about this safe. It goes way beyond what I was expecting in a home safe. Heavy and solid. I use it for keeping important papers and valuables at home.
customer_reviews.author: LarryJV

customer_reviews.title: Cheapo
customer_reviews.text: The safe is sturdy enough , but the code Panel doesn’t work properly, can only open with key , I have no interest in return process, will just use for long term storage ..... can not recommend product as stated
customer_reviews.author: A. Slay

customer_reviews.title: ... secure but I think they could have done a better job with the Numbers keypad when you open it
customer_reviews.text: The safe seems heavy solid and secure but I think they could have done a better job with the Numbers keypad when you open it, just one thin red wire holding it together but overall I love the SAFE would recommend it! Good product for the money
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: not the best, but good enough
customer_reviews.text: should've invest in a bigger safe, shelves are not too sturdy if nothing on them, good for some basic storage
customer_reviews.author: KangenEra

customer_reviews.title: Good Safe for the Money. Floor Mounting is Flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: The safe is good considering the price. The keypad is plastic but works well. My only complaint is that bolting it to the floor is not solid because the safe floor is flimsy and the safe bends when you pull on it.
customer_reviews.author: Armando101

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for the safe with fire proof at a reasonable price. Other safes are pretty expensive. This Amazonbasics safe is pretty durable and sturdy made. Very easy to operate. Recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: 365 Days of Happiness

customer_reviews.title: So easy to program the combination!
customer_reviews.text: I love this safe!! It is just the right size and it is a snap to set a new combination. It has a nice, solid feel and I was able to anchor it to the floor through the provided opening in the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Doro

customer_reviews.title: PASSWORD IS NOT WORKING
customer_reviews.text: I got the box, quality is good, but the password is not working after I re-set it ? How can I fix it? Need help. thanks
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy safe
customer_reviews.text: This is a strong and useful safe. The instructions are clear but it's still not very easy to use. The capacity and strength are good so I would suggest it if you are looking for an inexpensive yet sturdy safe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Key pad problem fix won't take your code
customer_reviews.text: I figure it out was having same problem when you put your new code in you need to hit the star key not the pound key and accepted my code, it doesn't say that anywhere in the manual. Safe is pretty large and secure
customer_reviews.author: DSK3

customer_reviews.title: Keypad doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: When setting up the electronic code, Instructions state to enter in the preset code to unlock the safe before entering in your own code. Preset code didn't work, so I used the key to open the safe and followed the instructions to reset the preset code and enter my own -- that did not work either. So now we have a safe with no electronic code that registers and to open the safe we have to pop off the keypad each time to use the key, which kind of defeats the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Willie Wiest

customer_reviews.title: Solid, easy to set up, and spacious enough for important documents.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy but not so heavy that I couldn’t roll it into a walk in closet. Setting the combo was easy. Purchased a larger silica pack than the one provided. Large enough for Important papers, a stack of family photos, half dozen CDs, and a three inch thick binder.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Bosch

customer_reviews.title: Not good at all!
customer_reviews.text: After a few months of use, this product became defective all of a sudden for no apparent reason... when I purchased this product, I was very excited because it was the perfect size for my needs. But total disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Pena

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect medium size safe for storing documents and important items. Two shelves is nice! Fit nicely in my home and doesn’t take up a lot of space. Very similar to what you’d find in a hotel room that provides a safe.
customer_reviews.author: BGregg

customer_reviews.title: Safe
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I wanted. Not too big but big enough to gold all my important papers. And they are now also virtually protected from fire as well.
customer_reviews.author: Iris osinski

customer_reviews.title: Well made safe.  Easy to lock and oprn
customer_reviews.text: Nice size. I have not had any problems locking or opening it. Fits my needs to keep important documents from water or fire damage in one place.
customer_reviews.author: k hawn

customer_reviews.title: SAFE HANDLE JAMMED - UNLOCKABLE
customer_reviews.text: We had purchased this safe for our office and now cannot use it as the handle has jammed making it unlockable. Need to determine how to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Marni Darby

customer_reviews.title: GOOD
customer_reviews.text: JUST WHAT I EXPECTED. SIMPLE TO USE AND I HAVE A KEY BACK UP
customer_reviews.author: William G. Ogles

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Great safe easy to operate and the perfect size for what I wanted (large than I thought it was).
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTOFF

customer_reviews.title: Password never works
customer_reviews.text: Password never works since beginning. I set the password, then try to open it with the password. However, it never works. I had a replacement, and it has exactly the same issue. A big disappointment, not just to this product but to also AmazonBasic brand. Lost trust to AmazonBasic brand.
customer_reviews.author: Yu F.

customer_reviews.title: Fair amount of space inside and takes up little space on the out side
customer_reviews.text: After setting the security code it only opened the door once. Had to use the back up keys to open its door after the initial code entry. Now neither the factory code nor my personalized code will work. Continuing to use the keys to open safe.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job.
customer_reviews.text: All my important documents etc are now safe in this item. Easy to step you your code. Please just add the 9V Battery with the item before shipping as a complementary. Had to drive to store just to buy the battery. Come on Amazon include the battery....
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas

customer_reviews.title: Big enough to store dead animals!
customer_reviews.text: Comes with both a key and a keypad! This safe is ginormous! You can fit stuffed dogs or cats in this bad boy!
customer_reviews.author: PJK

customer_reviews.title: This is a terrific little safe
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific little safe. Combination easy to set; keys nice to have. Would like two shelves instead of one, but most people probably don't care.
customer_reviews.author: joanna

customer_reviews.title: Died 15 months after purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The safe was sturdy enough, but it died 15 months after purchase. The warranty is only 12 months, so of course it died barely over the warranty period. I called Amazon customer service but they would not honor any warranty and I had to buy another safe. The bottom line: Don't buy. Cheap electronics that don't last.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Fishel

customer_reviews.title: handle
customer_reviews.text: fit perfect in the space we built for it, heavy, bolts to the floor, enough space for our needs. Problem, put the code in heard the tumblers move BUT the handle would not move. opens fine with the key but that isn't why we bought it. Amazon was good about the refund, even had UPS come to get it at their expense. Not sure if we will order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Gail R.

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: I still can't get a programmed code to take! Nice build though. Seems sturdy. But, I don't know what fire "resistant" means as apposed to "fire proof". I guess it's just a word GAME!
customer_reviews.author: robert j glaser

customer_reviews.title: Good safe
customer_reviews.text: I felt like I got good quality for what I paid for. The key paid seems a little flimsy but it is a good safe and has met all my expectations
customer_reviews.author: GB17

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Good price works fine but seems cheeply made. I drilled into the bottom with np. Also shelves i side are broken .
customer_reviews.author: Christoper A.

customer_reviews.title: No key, no manual provided
customer_reviews.text: Mine did not come with a key or manual. The pdf is online, which is helpful, but the safe is useless without a backup key.
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: Price is right
customer_reviews.text: I was going for something middle of the road. I acknowledge this might not be the best safe nor be absolutely fire proof, but for the price, this seems to be a decent product.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Good Home Safe.
customer_reviews.text: Could be the best deal for the price range out there. Super easy to program your own code. Serves my needs well. It's a home safe not a business safe so concider your needs. Everything I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne A. Long Jr.

customer_reviews.title: worst
customer_reviews.text: i start putting a fast good review, but after a month the codes didnt work so we start opening with the key, now the key dont work with all my equipment inside.... i feel desapointed with amazon....
customer_reviews.author: Horizonte Ensenada

customer_reviews.title: Glad it replaced my old one with this one
customer_reviews.text: Once you punch in your password, it swings opens smoothly and easily. It's not heavy and I like that. There's also 3 shelves which is convenient.
customer_reviews.author: E. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Don’t expect any support
customer_reviews.text: The owners manual is probably the worst thing ever written. They don’t include any instructions on what any type of blinking description for error codes. The customer service if you do call and ever for help with this product have no idea even what to say face in the only thing they have to go on when trying to help you fix something is the owners manual.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Not good Quality. The keypad came apart so easily and hangs by tape or something. Not something I want in my house for security.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Total Waste of Money and Time
customer_reviews.text: This is one piece of garbage! The codes don’t work and the digital system keypad is a joke
customer_reviews.author: David Wolan

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: Nice size and functions like it's suppose to. Glad it has a key as a second option. Don't like the other safes with a key that locks the keypad only.
customer_reviews.author: David N.

customer_reviews.title: Great Safe for documents and valuables!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our documents and valuables. Great size to hold what we need.
customer_reviews.author: Zoey Karimzada

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Such a nice safe for the price. Fit under the desk. Very very heavy. I like the reset button inside for changing codes
customer_reviews.author: M B

customer_reviews.title: Heavy safe.
customer_reviews.text: Its good the only reason I put four stars is because of the cheaper plastic on the front open area. It was a gift they are happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: CaP.

customer_reviews.title: Ok buy
customer_reviews.text: The door closer is a little lose for it to be fireproof I’m not willing to put it to the test but it works for what I need
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

product_meta.title: AmazonBasics Fire Resistant Box Safe, .83 Cubic Feet
feature_bullets: 0.8-cubic-foot fire-resistant safe for protecting digital media, important documents, and other valuables from theft and fire
Complies with modified UL 72 Standard for Safety Tests for Fire Resistance of Record Protection Equipment for 20 minutes at 1200 degrees Fahrenheit tested by Intertek
Durable 14-gauge heavy-duty steel body construction; 4 large 0.75-inch bolts for superior security
Electronic keypad provides quick and easy access; includes back-up key for emergency use
Adjustable shelf optimizes storage space; backed by an AmazonBasics limited 1-year warranty
Note: Please refer the user manual below for better use

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars921 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
